channel.title: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?
channel.description:
I found out what system the school is using to block out many many websites. I have tried MANY MANY thing's to get passed this! So don't even try to mention any traditional methods of trying to bypass school blocks. I have also tried to get around the proxy but sadly I can't using all the methods I know of.
This is the system they use: http://www.8e6security.com
I'm thinking they bought the package for $14K http://www.8e6security.com/8e6-Bundles.asp
Also I think they have probably purchased this: http://www.8e6security.com/ProxyBlocker.asp
Anyone think of anyways to bypass this?

item.title: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:5, topic:309918”]I don’t think it’s really $14K. For your school anyways.

*Note: This pricing is only available to new M86 Security Customers. The number of users is Total Internet Users, not concurrent users. Appliance handles maximum capacity of 75 hits per second. For Academic Bundle Pricing, please Contact Us.

There’s probably an academic discount.

[quote author=ziplock link=topic=406353.msg3003062#msg3003062 date=1256161421]
I’m failing this year anyways.
[/quote]You’re not in the boat alone. Lack of effort is my reasoning anyways. I’m not too far in to not be able to get out though. Just a 58% in US History and 56% in Spanish II. (Spanish I completely blew off, it’s not difficult at all…)[/quote]
F in US History and Spanish II?!

Read full topic
item.source: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?

item.title: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

My school was dumb they keep most of the admin files open so me and my friends would mess around and open every site that was blocked

Then I got caught, now I have to have a teacher watch what I am doing also I have average grades like 75+ if you what to get past there blocks then just go to the internet options and turn the security to the lowest and try to get into the blocked sites and delete them if you can get in lol, thats what I did or I would use a proxy.

Read full topic
item.source: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?

item.title: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?

item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Javafire:

if you wanna bypass security do everything you can to learn the password. DUH!

Good advice, not. Im sure he would needs his teachers login and password to do anything, and they are still blocked.

Read full topic

item.title: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote author=ziplock link=topic=406353.msg3003062#msg3003062 date=1256161421]

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:2, topic:309918”]Have a look around here
http://www.bill-mcminn.com/pchelp/webblocking.html[/quote]

It's not like i'm trying to get on blocked websites

I tried unblocking redtube.

Read full topic
item.source: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?

item.title: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:6, topic:309918”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=406353.msg3003075#msg3003075 date=1256161751]
I don’t think it’s really $14K. For your school anyways.

*Note: This pricing is only available to new M86 Security Customers. The number of users is Total Internet Users, not concurrent users. Appliance handles maximum capacity of 75 hits per second. For Academic Bundle Pricing, please Contact Us.

There’s probably an academic discount.

I’m failing this year anyways.
[/quote]You’re not in the boat alone. Lack of effort is my reasoning anyways. I’m not too far in to not be able to get out though. Just a 58% in US History and 56% in Spanish II. (Spanish I completely blew off, it’s not difficult at all…)

I don’t feel the motivation to complete school with great grades when i’m not even going to college, I plan to head off to Canada and find some work there.[/quote]

You better be prepared, my older brother works in the oilfield and makes excellent money, but at the cost of lots of sleep, and you may lose a lot of friends, Alberta is the best place to work for the oilfield, there are many different companies, Concord(CCS) Calfrac, etc. If you want any information on Canada’s high paying jobs contact me on irc, i live in Canada and i know very much about the oilfield industry and many other delivering industries.

Read full topic
item.source: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?

item.title: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:6, topic:309918”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=406353.msg3003075#msg3003075 date=1256161751]
I don’t think it’s really $14K. For your school anyways.

*Note: This pricing is only available to new M86 Security Customers. The number of users is Total Internet Users, not concurrent users. Appliance handles maximum capacity of 75 hits per second. For Academic Bundle Pricing, please Contact Us.

There’s probably an academic discount.

I’m failing this year anyways.
[/quote]You’re not in the boat alone. Lack of effort is my reasoning anyways. I’m not too far in to not be able to get out though. Just a 58% in US History and 56% in Spanish II. (Spanish I completely blew off, it’s not difficult at all…)

I don’t feel the motivation to complete school with great grades when i’m not even going to college, I plan to head off to Canada and find some work there.[/quote]It’s always good to have a fall-back, in which case I would recommend making the most of your high school degree. I plan on starting a business online and later moving on to larger things like department, but psychology has always been a thought of mine. Plus if I want anything to do with business I’m going to have to show something for it, hence the whole college deal.

Read full topic

item.title: Bypassing a very... Expensive "Web Security" (School block) system?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:2, topic:309918”]Have a look around here
http://www.bill-mcminn.com/pchelp/webblocking.html[/quote]

It’s not like i’m trying to get on blocked websites for personal reasons… This blocks so much “.gov” domain’s have been known to be blocked.

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:3, topic:309918”]If they bought a $14K dollar package for blocking your web, I’m only assuming it’s going to take a lot of dedication to get through it… Leading to a lot of trouble if you’re caught…

Who the hell spends fourteen-thousand on blocking webpages?[/quote]

Our school has a shit load of money and spends it on stupid stuff like this… I know… Fucking fourteen-thousand dollars. I am willing to take the punishment though. I’m failing this year anyways.

Read full topic
